title: Mueller Investigation Progress Report with Matt Apuzzo
description: New York Times Investigative Reporter Matt Apuzzo joins Chuck to talk about where the Mueller investigation is going, and what to expect in the coming months from the Special Counsel.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
